transcript:
he carne up panting, slackening his pace as he ap- proached. 
"You will soon be dressing your men in pet- ticoats! What is this?" shouted the regimental commander, thrusting forward his jaw and pointing at a soldier in the ranks of the third company in a greatcoat of bluish cloth, which contrasted with the others. "What have you been after? The commander in chief is ex- pected and you leave your place? Eh? I'll teach you to dress the men in fancy coats for a parade. . . . Eh . . . ?"
